I am sure it is quite the shock,
dying because your sister ate you.
When a man wishes from the heart,
all of his greatest weaknesses come to light.
You did not even think about how unnatural it is to bring someone back to life.
You want to believe that the one you loved is still alive somewhere on this Earth.
You hope that they will suddenly pop in tomorrow and say, Good morning.
You said something about a third wish,
but you have already made your third wish, have not you?
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
I will have you pay for this, Polnareff.
I will get better if I eat, right?
You are the one who brought us back.
It is your turn to enter the ground!
I-I was so freaked out that I forgot to summon Chariot.
I was so caught up in my wish that I forgot to use my Stand...
You do not have any wishes left.
I have already granted your three wishes.
You do not get any more.
Make sure you cry and scream all you can before you die.
You are in this island's backwoods.
Your voice will not reach the shore.
No one will come to save you.
Even though they are just clay dolls, it is not so bad being defeated by them.
Avdol, just like you said, you died because of me.
I have no complaints about whatever happens to me.
Are my eyes so blurry that I am seeing double?
It looks like there are two Avdols.
Of course there is only one clay doll.
If I am seeing things, I guess that means death is really close now.
Not to mention how much I am bleeding...
It makes sense that I would hallucinate.
Then... I guess I will die.
I will have to tap out early.
I will atone in the next world...
My eyes were not playing tricks!
He was stabbed by the Hanged Man, Centerfold!
Polnareff, you have not matured a bit.
about your sister without thinking of the consequences.
There is no way you can be alive!
I was told that after you were stabbed in the back,
Hol Horse blew your brains out, and you died on the spot.
But because I was stabbed in the back, for a moment,
I guess this is what you call a blessing in disguise.
Hol Horse's bullet only scratched my skin and skull,
so it never reached my brain, and was not a mortal wound.
But I did completely lose consciousness.
Cameo of the Judgment card, was it?
Should not you hurry and tell Dio and your other Stand user buddies about it?
I have to let them know!
This is, indeed, very surprising news.
Judgement's Cameo not only killed the idiot Polnareff,
but also killed Avdol, who was actually still alive!
I shall change it into good news!
Avdol, is that all you have got?
It looks like I will be able to share my good news after all.
I take back my statement that you had not matured.
I should be the one to apologize.
I shall grant them for you.
Before you die for real this time!
He is making fools of us!
You do not have to make any wishes.
Avdol, are you listening to me?
I wish to make the three wishes into four.
Cameo, you are the one that offered!
I will have you keep your promise!
You still insist upon this futile contest of power?
My first wish was to make you scream in pain.
You are much stronger than earlier!
The wound left after I was stabbed by the Hanged Man has not completely healed yet.
I was guarding that wound earlier,
so I could not use all of my strength.
I was finally able to stand again just three days ago in India.
I was able to take a plane here, so the trip was very easy.
To make you scream in fear!
To make you cry in regret!
With that kind of power and speed...
It is the rule of Stands that the user must be somewhere nearby.
He should be hiding very close by.
The user is hiding beneath the ground?!
What should I do with him?
He had the nerve to use my sister, so I will show him Hell!
I am going to drop all sorts of things in there...
I do believe nature is calling.
Shall we engage in the timeless ritual of male bonding,
You were not a guy who thought up perverse stuff like this before.
It is not because you were shot in the head, is it?
To not listen to your wishes.
Magician's Red will not forgive you.
You will never believe this, guys!
Who do you think I met?
Where did you get those wounds?
Do not let your back go out in shock, Kakyoin.
Who do you think I met, Mr. Joestar?
I will help you carry your luggage.
Avdol, is that wound on your back all right?
Has it really been two weeks?
Thank goodness we are all still okay.
Jotaro, you still wear all that stuff?
Hey, what is the deal with that attitude?!
A guy who was dead came back to life!
Why are you having normal conversations?!
When I said I buried Avdol in India...
It was Mr. Joestar and Jotaro who tended the wounds on my head and back in India.
Y-You assholes knew that Avdol was still alive in India, and you did not tell me?!
I only found out the day after.
But we could not let the enemy know.
And since you have such a big mouth...
I suggested that we keep it a secret from you.
If you would let the secret slip, Avdol could not have recovered in peace.
We were planning to tell you as soon as we knew he was safe,
but we had no idea you would run into him first.
Your dad is on this island!
Let us let him know you are here!
Oh, that was me in disguise.
No one comes to see me with good news!
I do not want to hear it!
Avdol's death was not your fault.
Did you have to go that far?!
How dare you guys leave me out like that?!
There is no reason to cry.
I did not think you would be this hurt.
There is a reason I came to this island in disguise.
It was partially so the enemy would not find out,
but I also had Avdol do a little shopping for me.
It was a very conspicuous purchase.
So I disguised myself as a rich Arab when I bought it.
Now, everyone, we are going to ride that and leave!
From here, we will ride to Egypt in this!
You really bought something like this?!
Perhaps a refreshing white would be best.
Hurry up and make some coffee.
I just do not know which one to pick.
Kakyoin, why are you taking that cup?
